actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.
Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to authorize grants for construction at certain historically Black colleges and universitites and similar institutions granting biomedical graduate degrees and enrolling substantial numbers of students from disadvantaged backgrounds, including racial and ethnic minorities.

summary.text: Minority Biomedical Research Construction Act - Amends the Public Health Service Act to authorize grants to eligible institutions, including historically Black colleges and universities, for the acquisition, construction, remodeling, expansion, or equipping of graduate biomedical research facilities. Defines as eligible an institution that has at least one-half of its students from disadvantaged backgrounds and that awards doctoral degrees in the health professions or biomedical sciences. Authorizes approprations.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to authorize grants for construction at certain historically Black colleges and universitites and similar institutions granting biomedical graduate degrees and enrolling substantial numbers of students from disadvantaged backgrounds, including racial and ethnic minorities.
